Export the following environment variables:

```bash
export CABAL_CONFIG="$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"/cabal/config
export CABAL_DIR="$XDG_DATA_HOME"/cabal
```

_cabal_ might also require you to edit your new _$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/cabal/config_ file by replacing all mentions of _~/.cabal_ with either _$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/cabal_ or _$XDG_DATA_HOME/cabal_.
